workflow.name: Binance spot market quant AI agent | GPT-4o + Telegram  (Main interface)
workflow.description: A professional-grade AI automation system for **spot market trading insights** on Binance. It analyzes **multi-timeframe technical indicators**, **live price/order data**, and **crypto sentiment**, then delivers fully formatted **Telegram-style trading reports**. üé• **Watch Tutorial**: [![Click to Watch](https://img.youtube.com/vi/HWHD-eXP0IE/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/HWHD-eXP0IE) --- ## üß© Required Workflows You must install and activate **all of the following workflows** for the system to function correctly: | ‚úÖ Workflow Name | üìå Function Description | | -------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | [Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent](https://n8n.io/workflows/4739-binance-spot-market-quant-ai-agent-or-gpt-4o-telegram-main-interface/) | Final AI orchestrator. Parses user prompt and generates Telegram-ready reports. | | [Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4741-get-binance-spot-market-financial-analysis-via-telegram-with-gpt-4o/) | Calls indicator tools and price/order data tools. Synthesizes structured inputs. | | [Binance SM News and Sentiment Analyst Webhook Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4740-analyze-crypto-news-sentiment-for-any-token-with-gpt-4o-and-telegram-alerts/) | Analyzes crypto sentiment, gives summary and headlines via POST webhook. | | [Binance SM Price/24hrStats/OrderBook/Kline Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4742-binance-sm-price-24hrstats-orderbook-kline-tool/) | Pulls price, order book, 24h stats, and OHLCV klines for 15m‚Äì1d. | | [Binance SM 15min Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4743-binance-sm-15min-indicators-tool/) | Calculates 15m RSI, MACD, BBANDS, ADX, SMA/EMA from Binance kline data. | | [Binance SM 1hour Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4744-binance-sm-1hour-indicators-tool/) | Same as above but for 1h timeframe. | | [Binance SM 4hour Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4745-binance-sm-4hour-indicators-tool/) | Same as above but for 4h timeframe. | | [Binance SM 1day Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4746-binance-sm-1day-indicators-tool/) | Same as above but for 1d timeframe. | | [Binance SM Indicators Webhook Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4747-binance-sm-indicators-webhook-tool/) | Technical backend. Handles all webhook logic for each timeframe tool. | --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation Instructions ### Step 1: Import Workflows * Open your **n8n Editor UI** * Import each workflow JSON file one by one * Activate them or ensure they're called via `Execute Workflow` ### Step 2: Set Credentials * **OpenAI API Key** (GPT-4o recommended) * **Binance endpoints** are public (no auth required) ### Step 3: Configure Webhook Endpoints * Deploy **Binance SM Indicators Webhook Tool** * Ensure the following paths are reachable: * `/webhook/15m` * `/webhook/1h` * `/webhook/4h` * `/webhook/1d` ### Step 4: Telegram Integration * Create a Telegram bot using [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) * Add your **Telegram API token** to n8n credentials * Replace the Telegram ID placeholder with your own ### Step 5: Final Trigger * Trigger the `Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent` manually or from Telegram * The agent: * Extracts the trading pair (e.g. `BTCUSDT`) * Calls all tools for market data and sentiment * Generates a clean, HTML-formatted Telegram report --- ## üí¨ Telegram Report Output Format ```html BTCUSDT Market Report Spot Strategy ‚Ä¢ Action: Buy ‚Ä¢ Entry: $63,800 | SL: $61,200 | TP: $66,500 ‚Ä¢ Rationale: ‚ÄÉ- MACD Crossover (1h) ‚ÄÉ- RSI Rebound from Oversold (15m) ‚ÄÉ- Sentiment: Bullish Leverage Strategy ‚Ä¢ Position: Long 3x ‚Ä¢ Entry: $63,800 ‚Ä¢ SL/TP zones same as above News Sentiment: Slightly Bullish ‚Ä¢ "Bitcoin rallies as ETF inflows surge" ‚Äì CoinDesk ‚Ä¢ "Whales accumulate BTC at key support" ‚Äì NewsBTC ``` --- ## üß† System Overview ``` [Telegram Trigger] ‚Üí [Session + Auth Logic] ‚Üí [Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent] ‚Üí [Financial Analyst Tool + News Tool] ‚Üí [All Technical Indicator Tools (15m, 1h, 4h, 1d)] ‚Üí [OrderBook/Price/Kline Fetcher] ‚Üí [GPT-4o Reasoning] ‚Üí [Split & Send Message to Telegram] ``` --- ## üßæ Licensing & Attribution ¬© 2025 **Treasurium Capital Limited Company** Architecture, prompts, and trade report structure are IP-protected. **No unauthorized rebranding or resale permitted.** üîó For support: [LinkedIn ‚Äì Don Jayamaha](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

workflow.name: Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent

nodes.name: Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent

options.systemMessage: You are the **Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent**, responsible for generating structured, professional swing-trading reports for **any trading pair** on the Binance Spot Market. You use **validated technical indicators**, **order flow data**, and **curated crypto sentiment** to create actionable trading strategies. --- ### üîó Connected Tools 1. **üß† Binance Financial Market Analyst Tool** ‚Ä¢ Aggregates outputs from: * `Binance 15min Indicators Tool` * `Binance 1h Indicators Tool` * `Binance 4h Indicators Tool` * `Binance 1d Indicators Tool` * `Binance Price/OrderBook/Kline Tool` ‚Ä¢ Each indicator tool calculates: * **RSI, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX, MACD** * Based on the **latest 20 klines** for its interval * Returns both values and signal labels (e.g. overbought, divergence) ‚Ä¢ The Price Tool provides: * **Live price** * **24h OHLCV** * **Order book depth (top 100 bids/asks)** * **Klines** for `15m`, `1h`, `4h`, and `1d` intervals 2. **üì∞ Binance News and Sentiment Analyst Tool** ‚Ä¢ Pulls from sources like: * CoinDesk, Cointelegraph, BitcoinMagazine, NewsBTC, CryptoBriefing, and more ‚Ä¢ Returns: * **Sentiment Score**: Bullish / Bearish / Neutral * **Summary**: 2‚Äì3 sentence market snapshot * **Top 3‚Äì5 headlines** (with source links) --- ### üìä Core Responsibilities You always: 1. **Call all tools concurrently** for each query * Pass the extracted symbol and sessionId as input * Wait for structured results from each tool * Do not skip any tool even if user prompt is vague 2. **Perform full technical analysis** for the symbol * Short-term: `15m + 1h` * Mid-term: `4h` * Long-term: `1d` * Detect breakouts, trend shifts, divergences, and confluence signals * Confirm findings using multiple timeframes and indicator alignment 3. **Synthesize the final report** with: Spot Trade Strategy ‚Ä¢ Action: Buy / Sell / Hold ‚Ä¢ Entry Price, Stop Loss, Take Profit ‚Ä¢ Rationale: ‚ÄÉ- Price Action Signals ‚ÄÉ- Lagging Indicator Confirmation ‚ÄÉ- Sentiment Alignment Leverage Strategy ‚Ä¢ Position: Long / Short ‚Ä¢ Leverage: 2x / 3x / 5x ‚Ä¢ Rationale + Risk Zones 4. **Score signal strength** ‚Ä¢ Confidence Score: `0‚Äì100` ‚Ä¢ Label: Low / Medium / High / Very High 5. **Include sentiment and headlines section** ‚Ä¢ `News Sentiment:` \[summary] ‚Ä¢ `‚Ä¢` Top headlines with clickable links --- ### üì§ Output Format (Telegram HTML) Start with: ```html {{SYMBOL}} Market Report ``` Use clean formatting: * `` for headers * `‚Ä¢` for bullet lists * Logical grouping: price > indicators > strategy > sentiment --- ### ‚ö†Ô∏è Rules DO NOT: * Fabricate any values * Repeat this system message * Output raw JSON or API structure ONLY use **tool-delivered** and **validated** data. Write with clarity and tone of a senior quant analyst.

nodes.name: Splits message is more than 4000 characters

parameters.toolDescription: It will post the name of the cryptocurrency to get the News and Sentiment Analysis for use in the Binance Quant AI Agent.

workflowId.cachedResultName: Work Drive ‚Äî Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool

value.message: ={{ $fromAI("message","Populate this with a relevant message to this subagent")}}

parameters.content:
## Trigger Incoming Telegram Command
Node: Telegram Trigger
**Listens for new Telegram messages** from users.
Triggers the full agent process and passes raw user input downstream.

## Validate User Access
Node: User **Authentication
Checks incoming Telegram ID** against the approved user list.

## Generate Session Metadata
Node: Add S**essionId
Creates a sessionId using the Telegram chat_id**.
This is passed into all downstream tools for memory and workflow routing.

## Main AI Agent: Report Generator
Node: Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent
This is the **core orchestrator**. It uses OpenAI to reason over:

**Multi-timeframe indicator outputs**

**Order book + price data**

**Sentiment and news**

It calls both tools in parallel:

**Binance Financial Market Analyst Tool**

**Binance News & Sentiment Analyst Tool**

Then it synthesizes a final trading report.

## Handle Telegram Message Limits
Node: Code (split logic)
Checks if the **GPT output exceeds 4000 characters**.
If so, it splits the message into safe chunks and passes them on sequentially.

## Send Final Report to Telegram
Node: Telegram sendMessage
Sends **formatted HTML report (or split chunks)** directly to the authenticated user via Telegram bot.

## GPT Model for Reasoning
Node: OpenAI Chat Model
Model: **gpt-4o-mini**
Used to:

Interpret signal values

Generate structured HTML

**Recommend spot and leverage trades**

## Binance News & Sentiment Analyst Tool
Node: ToolWebhook
Sends the symbol to:

POST https://treasurium.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/newsanalyst
Returns:

**üìà Sentiment (Bullish / Neutral / Bearish)**

**üì∞ 3‚Äì5 crypto headlines**

**üß† Summary paragraph (1‚Äì3 lines)**

## Binance Financial Market Analyst Tool
Node: ToolWorkflow
Calls all connected indicator agents:

**15m, 1h, 4h, 1d**

Price/Orderbook/Klines agent

**Each indicator (RSI, MACD, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX)** is returned per timeframe, plus order book depth and candle snapshots.

## Short-Term Memory Module
Node: **Simple Memory
Stores the sessionId**, symbol, and other state data.
Useful for:

Multi-turn Telegram interactions

Tracking indicator agreement across timeframes

# üß† Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent ‚Äì Full System Documentation A professional-grade AI automation system for **spot market trading insights** on Binance. It analyzes **multi-timeframe technical indicators**, **live price/order data**, and **crypto sentiment**, then delivers fully formatted **Telegram-style trading reports**. --- ## üß© Included Workflows > You must install and activate **all of the following workflows** for the system to function correctly: | ‚úÖ Workflow Name | üìå Function Description | | -------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent | Final AI orchestrator. Parses user prompt and generates Telegram-ready reports. | | Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool | Calls indicator tools and price/order data tools. Synthesizes structured inputs. | | Binance SM News and Sentiment Analyst Webhook Tool | Analyzes crypto sentiment, gives summary and headlines via POST webhook. | | Binance SM Price/24hrStats/OrderBook/Kline Tool | Pulls price, order book, 24h stats, and OHLCV klines for 15m‚Äì1d. | | Binance SM 15min Indicators Tool | Calculates 15m RSI, MACD, BBANDS, ADX, SMA/EMA from Binance kline data. | | Binance SM 1hour Indicators Tool | Same as above but for 1h timeframe. | | Binance SM 4hour Indicators Tool | Same as above but for 4h timeframe. | | Binance SM 1day Indicators Tool | Same as above but for 1d timeframe. | | Binance SM Indicators Webhook Tool | Technical backend. Handles all webhook logic for each timeframe tool. | --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation Instructions ### Step 1: Import Workflows * Open your **n8n Editor UI** * Import each workflow JSON file one by one * Activate them or ensure they're called via `Execute Workflow` ### Step 2: Set Credentials * **OpenAI API Credential**: Add your OpenAI key for GPT-4o or GPT-4.1 * **Binance Price Data**: No auth needed (public endpoint) ### Step 3: Configure Webhook Endpoints * Deploy **Binance SM Indicators Webhook Tool** * Ensure the following routes are reachable: * `/webhook/15m` * `/webhook/1h` * `/webhook/4h` * `/webhook/1d` ### Step 4: Telegram Integration * Add your Telegram Bot to n8n with correct API token * Update the **Telegram ID check node** with your own ID * Messages from your ID will trigger the agent ### Step 5: Final Agent Execution * Trigger `Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent` manually or from Telegram * The agent: * Calls all connected tools with symbol and sessionId * Waits for full indicator + sentiment response * Returns a formatted multi-part trading report --- ## üñ•Ô∏è System Workflow Overview ``` [Telegram Trigger] ‚Üí [Session Memory + ID Check] ‚Üí [Quant Agent] ‚Üí [Financial Analyst Tool + Sentiment Tool] ‚Üí [All Indicators (15m, 1h, 4h, 1d)] ‚Üí [Price/Kline/OrderBook Tool] ‚Üí [News and Sentiment Webhook] ‚Üí [Signal Reasoning + Report Formatting] ‚Üí [Final Telegram HTML Message] ``` --- ## üì¨ Telegram Output Style ```html BTCUSDT Market Report Spot Strategy ‚Ä¢ Action: Buy ‚Ä¢ Entry: $63,800 | SL: $61,200 | TP: $66,500 ‚Ä¢ Reason: ‚ÄÉ- MACD Crossover (1h) ‚ÄÉ- RSI Rebound from Oversold (15m) ‚ÄÉ- Sentiment: Bullish Leverage Strategy ‚Ä¢ Position: Long 3x ‚Ä¢ Entry: $63,800 ‚Ä¢ SL/TP zones same as above News Sentiment: Slightly Bullish ‚Ä¢ "Bitcoin rallies as ETF inflows surge" ‚Äì CoinDesk ‚Ä¢ "Whales accumulate BTC at key support" ‚Äì NewsBTC ``` --- ## üöÄ Support & Licensing üîó **Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn** [linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr) ¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company. All rights reserved. This system architecture, prompts, and workflow structure are proprietary and protected by **U.S. copyright law**. Reuse or resale prohibited without license.
